thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-China Resources Double-crane Pharmaceutical unit receives GMP certificate

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Resources Double-crane Pharmaceutical unit receives GMP certificate

organizations.name: china resources double-crane pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - China Resources Double-crane Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says wholly owned pharmaceutical unit received goods manufacture practice (GMP) certificate from Henan Food and Drug Administration
* Certificate issued to edaravone manufactured by the unit and the valid period is until Jan. 7, 2023
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/2sR7k1
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
